item.title: The strange world of Javascript and all its little asynchronous beasts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Javascript is a wonderland populated by all kinds of exotic beasts. Callbacks, events, promises, functional programming, reactive programming, streams, generators are all part of this incredible asynchronous bestiary. We’re talking of insidious or even ferocious things, a great danger to the unwary programmer. Let’s look at them, learn from them, tame them and finally put […]
item.content:encoded: Javascript is a wonderland populated by all kinds of exotic beasts. Callbacks, events, promises, functional programming, reactive programming, streams, generators are all part of this incredible asynchronous bestiary. We’re talking of insidious or even ferocious things, a great danger to the unwary programmer. Let’s look at them, learn from them, tame them and finally put them to our own advantage. Let’s stop Javascript from being an unfamiliar place and make it feel much more like home.
